movies.title: The Humpbacked Horse
movies.plot: Surreal Soviet fantasy movie about a man whose love is kidnapped by the Tsar and he must save her with the help of a humpbacked horse.
movies.simplePlot: Surreal Soviet fantasy movie about a man whose love is kidnapped by the Tsar and he must save her with the help of a humpbacked horse.

biography.placeOfBirth: village Krivel, Mogilev uyezd, Mogilev Governorate, Russian Empire [now Shklow Raion, Mahilyow Region, Belarus]
biography.bio: Pyotr Aleynikov was born on July 12, 1914 in village Krivel, Mogilev uyezd, Mogilev Governorate, Russian Empire as Pyotr Martynovich Alejnikov. He was an actor, known for The Humpbacked Horse (1941), No Greater Love (1943) and Tractor Drivers (1939). He died on June 9, 1965 in Moscow, RSFSR, USSR.
biography.name: Pyotr Aleynikov

biography.bio: Marina Kovalyova was born on January 1, 1923 as Marina Frantsevna Kovalyova. She was an actress, known for The Fall of Berlin (1950), The Humpbacked Horse (1941) and Nezabyvaemyy 1919 god (1951). She died on May 30, 2007 in Moscow, Russia.
biography.name: Marina Kovalyova

biography.bio: Georgiy Millyar was born on November 7, 1903 in Moscow, Russian Empire as Georgi Frantsevich Millyar. He was an actor, known for Frosty (1964), Baba Yaga (1973) and Kidnapping, Caucasian Style (1967). He was married to Millyar, Mariya. He died on June 4, 1993 in Moscow, Russia.
biography.name: Georgiy Millyar

biography.bio: Nikolay Gorlov was born on December 16, 1908 in Moscow, Russian Empire as Nikolai Matveyevich Gorlov. He was an actor, known for Sadaradjo djikhuri (1941), Dila mshvidobisa (1941) and Oblomov (1980). He died on November 6, 1989 in Moscow, RSFSR, USSR.
biography.name: Nikolay Gorlov

biography.bio: Lev Potyomkin was born on March 26, 1905 in Moscow, Russian Empire as Lev Lvovich Potyomkin. He was an actor and writer, known for Vasilisa the Beautiful (1940), Through Fire, Water and... Brass Pipes (1968) and Timur i yego komanda (1940). He was married to Nina Michailowna Sytina. He died on March 2, 1989 in Moscow, RSFSR, USSR.
biography.name: Lev Potyomkin

biography.placeOfBirth: Glazovo, Smolenskaya guberniya, Russian Empire [now Russia]
biography.bio: Mikhail Troyanovsky was born on November 7, 1889 in Glazovo, Smolenskaya guberniya, Russian Empire as Mikhail Konstantinovich Troyanovsky. He was an actor, known for The Childhood of Maxim Gorky (1938), Le tour du monde de Sadko (1953) and The Stone Flower (1946). He died on December 4, 1964 in Moscow, RSFSR, USSR.
biography.name: Mikhail Troyanovsky
